main event: Various sightings of unidentified aerial objects over Korea in October 1952.
interesting points: One observation included a metallic silver round object that changed speed and hovered, A report described 25 circular objects traveling at approximately 200 MPH, which sparkled in the sunlight, An observation of a bright light approaching a C-47 aircraft led to evasive action and gunfire, Pilots were able to confirm that their observations included objects exhibiting high speeds and erratic maneuvers, Multiple reports suggest the possibility of misidentifications related to balloons and other aerial phenomena.
sighted object: metallic silver objects and bright lights
